derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin sacerdotalis, from sacerdos, sacerdot- 'priest'

sentences.sentence: "sacerdotal emphasis on the authority of priests"

means.word_mean: 2. associated with the priesthood or priests;
